longInfo:
Passport required
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  for the period of intended stay. 

Visa required, except for Holders of British passports
endorsed  British Citizen . 
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days: 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British National
   (Overseas)"; 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British Overseas
   Territories Citizen  issued by Bermuda; 
 - for holders of British passports endorsed  British Subject 
   containing a Certificate of Entitlement to the Right of
   Abode issued by the United Kingdom; 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold documents required for their
  next destination. (SEE NOTE 44748)
    NOTE 44748: Not applicable to nationals of EEA Member
   States  and Switzerland.
- Only Schengen visas endorsed: "also valid for Reunion" are
  accepted.  
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets  co
  uld be refused entry. (SEE NOTE 44748) 
    NOTE 44748: Not applicable to nationals of EEA Member
   States  and Switzerland
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required if arriving within 6
days after leaving or transiting countries with risk of yellow
fever transmission For details, click here.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
- Passengers transiting countries with risk of yellow fever
  transmission if not leaving the transit areas.
